siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command

markdownRemark.excerpt: When you want to have unmodified values on your dashboard. Display type text doesn’t have options to modify values in any way. It will just use raw values from…
markdownRemark.html: When you want to have unmodified values on your dashboard. Display type text doesn’t have options to modify values in any way. It will just use raw values from the command output.

frontmatter.title: When to use string display types?
